name: Woodular Shrine

name: Crystal Shrine

name: Pantheon Shrine

name: Summereading Shrine

name: Crescent Shrine

name: Undead Shrine

name: Primordial Shrine
desc: Boosts AFK Gain Rate on this map by +%, up to 150% tot. @ AFK Time to next Lv: @
